Thumbs up and big thank you The School of Make Up!

Trainer Peter  ANGEL has a talent for showcasing how makeup can enhance my features!üëç
The makeup essential & service excellence course was highly  practical & engaging, All  materials were well-structured. Overall, it was a great refresher on maintaining  business environments. I would highly recommend it to anyone looking to refine their professional presence.

Thank u PeterAngel for such an enjoyable 2 days course!  Now that I am up-to-date with the numerous new beauty products, I am more confident than ever to either do a basic make-up for an ordinary work day or a fancy make-up for a party!  Looking forward to attending more advance make up courses with PeterAngel soon!

Teachers Peter Angels and Yvonne are friendly, humorous, helpful, and highly knowledgeable. I truly enjoy their makeup courses, which have helped me better understand my face shape, color tone, and more.

Enjoyed thoroughly the 2 full days for the make up essentials course conducted by Peter Angel and Yvonne. Both the instructors are very knowledgeable and entertaining. Recommend to all who want to learn the basics of makeup! Furthermore skliis future credits claimable. Kudos to the instructors!!
